titles.title: Making the CFPB Accountable to Small Businesses Act of 2025
Making the CFPB Accountable to Small Businesses Act of 2025
To impose additional requirements for covered agencies in regulatory flexibility analysis.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Small Business, and Financial Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
